thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Welcoming staff
thread.title_full: Welcoming staff - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jan H
title: Welcoming staff
text: Stayed for two nights. Friendly welcome and efficient booking in. Reception staff booked a table for dinner in a nearby restaurant for us having checked they had a vegan menu (Zizzi). Rooms are quite small but comfortable and well equipped, including microwave. Good location near Victoria Station and Buckingham Palace. Reception staff very pleasant and helpful at all times. Would not hesitate to stay there again.
